name: horizon-hcm-monorepo
description: Horizon HCM - House Committee Management Platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../web-app && npm install && cd ../mobile-app && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules web-app/node_modules mobile-app/node_modules shared/node_modules
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../web-app && npm run lint
scripts.type-check: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../web-app && npm run type-check && cd ../mobile-app && npm run type-check && cd ../shared && npm run type-check
